entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, St. Leonard
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:54 AM AST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
